title: Exciting & Engaging Events
text: Ethical Hacking Days spans three days filled with diverse and interactive activities designed to enhance your knowledge and test your skills in cybersecurity.

section.title: Day 1: Kick-off & Presentations
section.content: The event begins with a general presentation of our sponsors and collaborators, followed by keynote speeches from industry leaders and representatives of ENSA Tangier.

section.title: Day 2: Capture The Flag (CTF)
section.content: Compete in our intense CTF competition, showcasing your technical skills and teamwork in real-world cybersecurity scenarios.

section.title: Day 3: Workshops & Keynotes
section.content: Join practical workshops on the latest cybersecurity technologies and attend discussions on the future of cybersecurity in Morocco.
